company.tagline: We are building a world class AI research lab in Tokyo.
company.description: We want to develop AI solutions for Japan’s needs, and democratize AI in Japan.

recent_partnerships: Sakana AI and Daiwa Securities Group to Develop AI for Advanced Asset Consulting

events.title: First Open House Event for Applied Engineers
events.description: Sakana AI held its first Open House event for Applied Engineers, with around 70 attendees on-site and over 200 participating online.

events.title: Launch of ALE-Agent
events.description: Sakana AI introduced ALE-Agent, a coding agent designed to tackle hard optimization problems, achieving significant results in a competition.

events.title: Award at Joint AI Competition
events.description: Sakana AI won one of three awards at a competition hosted by the Japanese Ministry of Defense and the US Department of Defense, recognizing its new AI solutions.

events.title: Achievement in AtCoder Heuristic Competition by ALE-Agent
events.description: ALE-Agent ranked 21st out of 1,000 human participants in a live AtCoder Heuristic Competition, marking a notable achievement in AI.

events.title: Publication Acceptance at ICLR
events.description: Sakana AI's TAID was accepted as a Spotlight Paper at the ICLR, showcasing their advanced Japanese small language model, TinySwallow-1.5B.

events.title: Release of CycleQD Technology
events.description: Sakana AI developed CycleQD, a new technology focusing on evolutionary computation and lifelong learning for LLM agents.

events.title: Continuous Thought Machine Development
events.description: Sakana AI started rethinking cognition with the development of the Continuous Thought Machine, a new type of neural network.

events.title: Completion of Large-Scale Dataset for Edo Texts
events.description: Sakana AI completed a large-scale dataset of approximately 25 million characters from Edo period texts for training their chatbot, からまる.
